channel.title: Skillcape emotes?
channel.description: Hey I've been working on allstar server and making home and training and stuff. I was wondering if anyone knew how to add skill cape emotes to allstar source. Thanks in advance to anyone/everyone who helps. (You rock if you can help broh! :cool: :))

item.title: Skillcape emotes?
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

ohh uhm well allstar has emotes but uhh simply go to client.java and search the item id of the cape u want and where u see like setgfx: or something like that u change it to the gfx u want and same thing for anim.if u need help just pm me i worked on allstar for months

Read full topic
